      • GetEntity

        public static de.dfki.omm.types.OMMEntity GetEntity(org.restlet.Request request)
        Retrieves an OMM entity from a HTTP request.
        Parameters:
        request - The request from which to retrieve an entity.
        Returns:
        An OMMEntity constructed from the request's IP address and the current time.

      • GetApiEntity

        public static de.dfki.omm.types.OMMEntity GetApiEntity()
        Retrieves an OMM entity representing the Application.
        Returns:
        An OMMEntity with type "api", value "Application" and the current time as date.

      • InIPv4Format

        public static boolean InIPv4Format(java.lang.String addressString)
        Checks whether an address is in IPv4 format.
        Parameters:
        addressString - Address to check.
        Returns:
        True, if address is in IPv4 format (has four parts, separated by "."s).

      • InIPv6Format

        public static boolean InIPv6Format(java.lang.String addressString)
        Checks whether an address is in IPv6 format.
        Parameters:
        addressString - Address to check.
        Returns:
        True, if address is in IPv6 format (has eight parts, separated by ":"s).

      • GetBlockId

        public static java.lang.String GetBlockId(org.restlet.Request request,
                                          java.util.List<java.lang.String> blockIdList,
                                          int positionFromEnd)
        Extracts the block ID coded in the URL (given by the request) and looks if this ID is found in the given blockIdList. The URL is parsed end-to-begin and the relevant part is given by the positionFromEnd-parameter. Example: http://localhost:10082/rest/sample/st/block/4/ with positionFromEnd == 0 gives "4" as ID, postitionFromEnd == 2 would give "st". The method returns the aforementioned ID if it is contained in the given blockIdList, null else.
        Parameters:
        request -
        blockIdList -
        positionFromEnd -
        Returns:

      • GetPathComponent

        public static java.lang.String GetPathComponent(org.restlet.Request request,
                                                int positionFromEnd)
        Extracts the n-th component of the URL given by the request. The URL is parsed end-to-begin and the relevant part is given by the positionFromEnd-parameter. Example: http://localhost:10082/rest/sample/st/block/4/ with positionFromEnd == 0 gives "4" as ID, postitionFromEnd == 2 would give "st". The method returns the positionFromEnd-th part of the URL (counted from the end) if it exists, null else.
        Parameters:
        request -
        positionFromEnd -
        Returns:

      • XmlSnipped2OMMDocString

        public java.lang.String XmlSnipped2OMMDocString(java.lang.String snipped)
        Converts an XML snippet to a full XML document String.
        Parameters:
        snipped - The snippet to extend to a valid OMM document.
        Returns:
        Complete OMM document in XML format including the snippet.
